pricing.note: This is a non-profit VPN project committed to helping users bypass censorship and access free information. We offer a permanently free plan with speeds up to 10 Mbps, fast enough for smooth 1080p streaming and safe, uncensored communication. We strive to reduce costs via free-tier cloud services, but after the Beta phase, we may introduce paid premium plans to cover server expenses only.
